== Dashboard ==

=== Option 1: Install Ubuntu Package ===

  * Step 1 - Add the Afrimesh package archive keys to your system:
  {{{
  sudo  su -
  apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 50CFBA3E
  echo "deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/afrimesh/ppa/ubuntu hardy main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list 
  apt-get update
  }}}

  * Step 2 - Install the afrimesh-dashboard package
  {{{
  apt-get install afrimesh-dashboard
  }}}

  Alternate Instructions for installing via Synaptic Package Manager can be found [https://launchpad.net/+help/soyuz/ppa-sources-list.html here]
